I can guide you through Adverse drug reaction list, Blood pressure tracking, Hospitals and Pharmacies
Offering support for Adverse drug reaction, Blood pressure, Hospitals and Pharmacies

I think the best choice is going to nutritionist or meeting professional trainer at famous GYM Center to get advice & a suitable diet plan. However, if you dont have much time, let research some diet method onine or I can suggest you some here - https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/best-diet-plans

I think that you should check your BMI first. It is Body Mass Index (BMI) - a person's weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters. A high BMI can indicate high body fatness. You can check it here: https://www.cdc.gov/healthyweight/assessing/bmi/adult_bmi/english_bmi_calculator/bmi_calculator.html

Eat-clean is really good for your health. I got some information from Vinmec -  a well-known health care system in Vietnam: https://vinmec.com/vi/tin-tuc/thong-tin-suc-khoe/dinh-duong/che-do-eat-clean-la-gi/

it's not difficult if you have strong will and desire for good health. I got some information for you here: https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/clean-eating-tips#:~:text=24%20Clean%20Eating%20Tips%20to%20Lose%20Weight%20and,Stop%20Eating%20%E2%80%9CDiet%E2%80%9D%20Foods.%20...%20More%20items...%20

responses: It is important to know how to distinguish covid from the common flu, let's check some symptoms here by Ministry of Health: https://www.youtube.com/watchv=L1VP_wYNNUU
Please follow 5K of Ministry of Health, detail is here: https://soha.vn/bo-y-te-huong-dan-cach-phong-chong-covid-19-20210729111350003.htm

Ministry of Health also shared us sauna methods to protect our health from Covid virus, please check here: https://dantri.com.vn/suc-khoe/bo-y-te-huong-dan-cach-xong-phong-covid19-20210927151701586.htm

patterns: what should I do if I am positive with covid
what to do if I am F0 Covid
responses: If you are F0, please take these notes immediately - https://vietnamese.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/if-you-are-sick/steps-when-sick.html

If you are F0 & choose to stay at home, please check what you should & shouldnt do here by Ministry of Health - https://moh.gov.vn/hoat-dong-cua-dia-phuong/-/asset_publisher/gHbla8vOQDuS/content/neu-chang-may-ban-la-f0-can-lam-gi-va-khong-nen-lam-gi-

I really hope that you are healthy during this tough time. If you are positive Covid, please inform your family, friends & colleagues to make sure that they understand your situation & check their health. Moreover, please take enough rest, encrusted with vitamin C and protein for good resistance
